content: this pattern has household patterns for cleaning cloths a scrubby and tea towels using both knit and crochet techniques depending on project you will need a tapestry needle for finishing with all of these pieces 1 dirt the dish cloth - knit gauge 21 sts and 42 row in garter stitch to 4 10 cm finished size 7 9 9 8 20 25 cm square 1 ball buddy hemp yarn 2 the everything cloth - crochet gauge 15 sts and 16 row in crochet linen stitch to 4 10 cm finished size 9 11 23 28 cm square 1 ball buddy hemp yarn 3 tassel towel - knit gauge 18 sts and 28 row in 3x3 rib stitch to 4 10 cm finished size 14 2 36 cm wide x 16 9 43 cm long plus 2 5 cm tassels you will also need blocking pins for this project 1 ball buddy hemp yarn 4 tea time towel - crochet gauge 21 sts and 42 row in lemon peel stitch to 4 10 cm finished size 8 9 22 5 cm wide x 118 1 46 cm long 2 balls buddy hemp yarn 5 rub a dub dub face scrubbie - crochet gauge not important finished size approximately 3 5 9 cm in diameter in single_crochet scraps of buddy hemp yarn
